title: Copper and electrocatalytic synergy for the construction of fused quinazolinones with 2-aminobenzaldehydes and cyclic amines
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32195-32199
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06539E, Paper

Yujie Shi, Ganpeng Li, Ruirui Wang, Xiao-jing Zhao, Yonghui He
A new copper and electrocatalytic synergy strategy for efficiently constructing fused quinazolinones has been developed.
